title: Project creation should confirm the availability of scrubbing the bin directory
description: When creating a new project, there should be a confirmation that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
OB: No confirmation message is displayed when creating a new project in the system.
EB: A confirmation message should be displayed when creating a new project, indicating that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
SR:
1. Open the system.
2. Navigate to the project creation page.
3. Fill in the necessary details to create a new project.
4. Click on the 'Create' button.
5. Verify if a confirmation message is displayed, indicating that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
